# Digital Transformation Essentials
Digital transformation is the integration of digital technology into all areas of business.
Core principles:
1. Customer Experience: Digital-first approach to customer interactions
2. Operational Agility: Flexible processes that adapt quickly
3. Culture & Leadership: Foster innovation mindset
4. Workforce Enablement: Empower employees with digital tools
5. Digital Technology Integration: Cloud, AI, IoT adoption
Success requires alignment between technology investments and business strategy.
